title: Written Tycoon
text:
Written Tycoon (foaled 6 September 2002) is a <a href="Group%20races">stakes</a> winning <a href="Australian">Australian</a> Thoroughbred <a href="racehorse">racehorse</a> and successful sire who has sired multiple <a href="Group%20One">Group 1</a> winners.
Racing career.
Written Tycoon commenced his race career with an easy win at <a href="Randwick%20Racecourse">Randwick</a> as a pronounced 7/4 favourite.
Two weeks later, he was narrowly beaten by filly Fashions Afield at Randwick. Fashions Afield would later frank the form in claiming the <a href="Sires%27%20Produce%20Stakes%20%28ATC%29">Sires' Produce Stakes</a> and <a href="Reisling%20Stakes">Reisling Stakes</a>. 
Written Tycoon then recorded his only other career victory when winning the <a href="Todman%20Stakes">Todman Stakes</a> at <a href="Rosehill%20Racecourse">Rosehill</a>.
Written Tycoon was retired as a four-year old after finishing unplaced in the <a href="Challenge%20Stakes%20%28ATC%29">Challenge Stakes</a>.
Stud career.
Written Tycoon initially stood at Eliza Park Stud in <a href="Victoria%2C%20Australia">Victoria, Australia</a> for a service fee of <a href="A%24">A$</a>6,600. In 2013 he was relocated to Woodside Park Stud for a fee of $13,750. 
By 2018 his service fee had increased to $110,000. In 2020 it was announced that Written Tycoon would be relocated to Arrowfield Stud in <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a>. 
Notable progeny.
Written Tycoon's <a href="Group%20One">Group 1</a> winners:
'c = <a href="colt%20%28horse%29">colt</a>, f = <a href="filly">filly</a>", g = <a href="gelding">gelding</a>"
